info.name: multitenancy001-e2e (v10.9.16 - FULL - ALL ENDPOINTS - STRICT + mass flow deterministic no-loop) (v10.9.16.1 patch) (v10.9.16.2 patch mass-jsonsafe)
info.description:
v10.9.16 PATCH: runner guards + env patch (tenant vars defaults), no non-ASCII output.

v10.8: STRICT collection-level contract + multi-tenant login ambiguity scenario (diagnostic + realistic CNPJ gen). | v10.9.3: fail on any 5xx (>=500).

v10.9.14: mass flow 99 without setNextRequest loops; deterministic category/subcategory/product selection; guarantees products before sales via prerequisites; smart fallbacks via fallback_*_id variables.

exec: // Do NOT override explicit request headers
// - Allowed statuses per HTTP method (smoke contract)
// Allowed statuses by method (SMOKE contract: accept 2xx + expected client errors, but NEVER 500).
// In E2E mode you can be stricter. Default: still accept client errors to avoid breaking on "empty body" calls.
const rid = pm.response.headers.get('X-Request-Id') || pm.response.headers.get('X-RequestId') || pm.response.headers.get('requestId') || pm.response.headers.get('Request-Id');
return { method, url, status, rid, tenant, auth, bodyPreview };
pm.test('Status code acceptable for ' + (mode === 'e2e' ? 'E2E' : 'SMOKE') + ' (' + method + ')', function () {
pm.expect(allowed, `Allowed status codes for ${method} in ${mode} mode`).to.include(status);
